infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Mobility Journey uses your camera to analyze your posture and capture progress photos so you can track improvements over time.
infoPlist.NSMotionUsageDescription: Mobility Journey uses AirPods motion sensors to monitor your head and neck posture in real time, helping you build better posture habits.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Mobility Journey accesses your photo library so you can select existing photos for posture analysis and progress tracking.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Mobility Journey saves progress photos to your library so you can access them outside the app.
infoPlist.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: Mobility Journey reads your health data including sleep, HRV, heart rate, and step count to personalize your corrective exercise plans and track recovery progress.
infoPlist.NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription: Mobility Journey saves your completed workout and mobility session data to Apple Health so all your fitness data stays in one place.
